top_projects.name: Traffic-Anomaly-Detector
top_projects.description: Detects anomalies in traffic flow. If there is a green light and a traffic jam at the same time, it is an anomaly. The database gets updated and suitable alerts are given. The accident detection algorithm detects accidents in the anomaly.

top_projects.name: ML-Assignment-2
top_projects.description: Implement a machine learning model with a dataset of your choice.

bigbinary/neeto-editor.summary: The neeto-editor repository has recently seen significant contributions. On February 12, a pull request was submitted to embed Supademo video links, and it also includes updates to translations and the addition of regex to match Supademo video links.

bigbinary/neeto-icons.summary: The neeto-icons repository has seen some recent activity. On February 5, a push event was triggered by a fresh deployment.

bigbinary/rubocop-neeto.summary: The rubocop-neeto repository has recently seen a significant push event bumped rack from 3.0.11 to 3.0.12.

profile_summary: As a software engineer with a strong background in C, TypeScript, and Python, I develop innovative solutions that drive business growth at Big Binary. With over 75 public repositories and a network of 100 followers, I've established myself as a go-to expert in my field. Through my work, I strive to bridge the gap between technology and business, creating high-performance software that makes a tangible impact.
